General.Name: Lanvin Group Holdings Limited
General.Description: Lanvin Group Holdings Limited operates as a couture house in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, North America, Greater China, and other Asian countries. It operates through five segments: Lanvin, Wolford, St. John, Sergio Rossi, and Caruso. The company offers ready-to-wear, made to measure, footwear, leather goods, costume jewelry, accessories, eyewear, and childrenswear under the Lanvin brand name; legwear, ready-to-wear, and lingerie and beachwear under the Wolford brand; footwear under the Sergio Rossi brand name; luxury outerwear, dresses, suiting, knits, bottoms, gowns, suiting, cocktail dresses, separates, and accessories under the St. John brand; and leisurewear and formalwear for men under the Caruso brand name. The company was founded in 1889 and is based in Shanghai, China.
